channel.title: Zarpor Good economy, Very Active, Weekly Updates!
channel.description:
[img]http://www.zarpor.com/images/banner3anim.gif[/img]
Play Zarpor at - http://www.zarpor.com http://www.zarpor.com/client.php for the client Working curses, Full Godwars Dungeon, 8 minigames, including 2 custom ones, Perfect bank search and bank tabs, Completionist Cape and all skillcape emotes working Custom donator area and donator benefits, Active staff team, Good economy, Active forums including highscores, Fully working party room, Fully working staking and pking, Weekly updates, Fully working clan chats
please refer ingame user :mercora and pm him if you need help
http://youtu.be/0LdFeDGBtvI heres a video for it [img]http://www.zarpor.com/images/zarporadvert.png[/img]
